attributes.action: ensure educational establishments comply with the highest environmental standards.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make capital funding available so that every school can invest in free energy. This should be used for heating, hot water and energy.
All schools with playgrounds should be able to avail themselves of ground source heat via a heat pump. Schools on small sites can bore deep for similar heat.
Solar water heating and wind turbines suitable for the site will be visible educators.
Extra insulation and "sun-trap" southerly rooms can assist.
The aim should be 100% compliance and 100% free energy when practicable.
Full educational use should be made of improvements for educating pupils and the surrounding community.
